price: Waɗanda suke gãdõn (Aljannar) Firdausi,* su a cikinta madawwama ne.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يَرِثُونَ ٱلۡفِرۡدَوۡسَ هُمۡ فِيهَا خَٰلِدُونَ
footnotes: * Asalin firdausi fadama mai ruwa da itãce da ni'ima. Aljannar firdausi ita ce mafi ɗaukakar Aljanna.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna yarithūna al-fir'dawsa hum fīhā khālidūna
